meanings.definition: Thulias (noun): a type of flowering plant
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with colorful thulias.
meanings.sent2: I planted some thulias in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The thulias in the park seemed to be dancing in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a thulias in spring.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the thulias lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: Thulias (adjective): relating to or characteristic of thulias
meanings.sent1: She wore a thulias scarf around her neck.
meanings.sent2: The painting had a thulias color palette.
meanings.sent3: The thulias pattern on the curtains made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a thulias quality that was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The thulias decorations added a touch of elegance to the event.
